name: Dion Marketing
tagline: We are a strategic marketing and advertising firm
description: Dion Marketing Company is a full-service advertising agency that provides media planning, media buying, promotions and special events, design, public relations, campaign management, marketing consulting and social media for companies across the United States. Specializing in maximizing every dollar of their clients' budgets, Dion Marketing Company provides marketing solutions focus to obtain the highest return on investment possible.
